SQL_STMT_U.val: select COUNT(*) from MODELL where EBENE1=:1 and EBENE2=:2 and EBENE3=:3 and EBENE4=:4 and hersteller=:5
select COUNT(*) from MODELL where EBENE1=:1 and EBENE2=:2 and EBENE3=:3 and EBENE4=:4 and hersteller=:5 and aktiv=:6
select COUNT(*) from MODELL where EBENE1=:1 and EBENE2=:2 and EBENE3=:3 and EBENE4=:4 and hersteller=:5 and bearbeitet=:6
select COUNT(*) from Artikel where EBENE1=:1 and EBENE2=:2 and EBENE3=:3 and EBENE4=:4 and hersteller=:5 and Zuordnung='M' and MODELLGRUPPE<=0
